thumb.title: Updates are on the way, but until then… enjoy the chaos.
thumb.description: Instagram: Flawless multiplayer. Smooth gameplay.Reality: Server exploded, teammate vanished into the wall.Thought we were making a game. Turns out it’s a comedy show.Updates are on the way, but until then… enjoy the chaos.https://store.steampowered.com/app/3822530/Camp_Wombo/?beta=0#indiegame #gamedev #glitch #funnygaming
